references: Clifford A. Pickover, The Math Book, Sterling Publishing Co. (New York), 2009, p. 266.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=(Pi - sqrt(3))/2; for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b060708.txt", n, " ", d)); } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 09 2009]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 05 2001
extensions: KEYWORD cons added by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 09 2009
Final digits of sequence corrected using the b-file. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 30 2009
